column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Tenzin says : " You like that , do n't you , Blueberry Spicehead ?
#Text=I bet they 'd like it too .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Let 's not .
#Text=They 'll only spoil our good mood .
#Text=" Ikki says : " What do you mean ?
#Text=Aunt Kya is super nice and pretty and always asks me how I 'm feeling , and Uncle Bumi is , like , the funniest person in the world .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " But what about Meelo ?
#Text=He 's hilarious too , you never know what 's going to come out of his mouth .
#Text=And Jinora can be so sweet and gentle .
#Text=" Ikki says : " And mean .
#Text=And bossy .
#Text=Being part of a family is hard , huh , Daddy ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I could n't agree with you more .
#Text=" Ikki says : " But , I guess the nice part about a family is they 'll always be there for you .
#Text=Even though Twinkle Starchild and Princess Rainbow fight , they still love each other .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " That 's very wise of you , Ikki .
#Text=" Ikki says : " We should probably head back , huh ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I suppose .
#Text=We ca n't hide in this cave forever .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Do n't worry , Daddy .
#Text=We 'll come back and visit Blueberry Spicehead .
#Text=I know you really bonded with her .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Yes , I 'd like that .
#Text="
